title: At turn of year, Musk’s ‘spicy’ AI feature triggers sour response from Indian regulators
description: Concerns about AI-generated explicit content arise from Grok's recent feature, leading to government scrutiny in India. The Centre is calling for stricter regulations on social media platforms like X, emphasizing the need for accountability in light of rising complaints.

title: Chinese Giants Pay Big To Attract AI Specialists
description: (MENAFN - AzerNews) By Alimat AliyevaIn the midst of the global race for AI dominance, Chinese techcompanies are offering record-breaking salaries to attract toptalent. According to sources, ...

title: Emerging-Market Stock Index Hits Five-Year High on AI Bets
description: Emerging-market stocks were off to strong start in 2026, climbing to the highest in almost five years as optimism about Asia’s growing role in artificial intelligence propelled the region’s technology shares.

title: TEDxNaperville founder stepping down from his role, launching new speaker series focused on AI
description: Arthur Zards is stepping down as the organizer of TEDxNaperville to launch a new local event focused on artificial intelligence.

title: Revolutionary AI Initiative Accelerates TB Screening in Thane
description: In an ambitious public health initiative Thane district of Maharashtra has screened over 14000 residents for tuberculosis using innovative AI-based handheld X-ray machines an official reported on Saturday
